S04n363:1: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako daśottaraṃ nagaraśatamaṭitvā sumanāmukhadikpratyuddeśaṃ gatvā atiṣṭhat mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ cintayan anuvilokayan mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya darśanamabhilaṣan prārthayamānaḥ samavadhānamākāṅkṣamāṇaḥ |
S04n363:2: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto daśottarādyojanaśatātpāṇiṃ prasārya sumanāmukhanagarasthitasyaiva sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpya evamāha-sādhu sādhu kulaputra na śakyaṃ śraddhendriyavirahitaiḥ khinnacittaiḥ līnacittairanabhyastaprayogaiḥ pratyudāvartyavīryairitvaraguṇasaṃtuṣṭairekakuśalamūlatanmayaiścaryāpraṇidhānābhinirhārākuśalaiḥ kalyāṇamitrāparigṛṣṭītairbuddhāsamanvāhṛtairiyaṃ dharmatā jñātum,
S04n363:3: eṣa nayaḥ eṣa gocaraḥ eṣa vihāro jñātuṃ vā avagāhayituṃ vā avatarituṃ vā adhimoktuṃ vā kalpayituṃ vā pratyavagantuṃ vā pratilabdhuṃ vā iti ||
S04n363:4: sa taṃ dharmakathayā saṃdarśayitvā samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣayitvā asaṃkhyeyadharmamukhasamanvāgataṃ kṛtvā anantajñānamahāvabhāsaprāptaṃ kṛtvā aparyantabodhisattvadhāraṇīpratibhānasamādhyabhijñajñānaveśāviṣṭaṃ kṛtvā samantabhadracaryāmaṇḍale'vatārayitvā svadeśe ca pratiṣṭhāpya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasyāntikāt prakrāntaḥ ||53 ||
